title: Pre-Game Chat
body: Before with the new client, the chat box for the team members in champ select you could see past past pregame chats, if there was a dodge. but now there isn't is there a way to see the previous messages. Only asking because there were some word going back and forth between two people and i believe that i ran into the worse of the two in the next champ select. He denied know me though so there isn't a away to see.

replies.body: Hmmmm yea it kind of sucks that we can't see that anymore, and I don't think we keep logs of the pre game chat either so I'm not sure we'd be able to help you track that guy down now =\ .
will this be added back to the game or is it forever gone?
